pullrequest.title: Install cmake files to share instead of lib

content.raw: I was able to use it together with ign-math without problems. The CI is happy. I've notice that when installing the files using DESTDIR \(i.e. `DESTDIR=/tmp/foo make install`\) there are some `$HOME` paths that end up being installed there, but the problem is also present in `default`
content.html: I was able to use it together with ign-math without problems. The CI is happy. I've notice that when installing the files using DESTDIR (i.e. DESTDIR=/tmp/foo make install) there are some $HOME paths that end up being installed there, but the problem is also present in default
